title: Fireside with the Underboss - "Frankie Botts Is Dead"
description: Sammy plans a very low-key 4th of July party so he can enjoy the time with his family & crew. One guest in particular, Frankie Botts, doesn't show up. This was odd because he was about to get transferred to Sammy's crew... then his body was found.
itunes:author: Sammy "The Bull" Gravano
itunes:subtitle: Sammy plans a very low-key 4th of July party so he can enjoy the time with his family & crew. One guest in particular, Frankie Botts, doesn't show up. This was odd because he was about to get transferred to Sammy's crew... then his body was found.
